CustomField.description: Description of environmental controls plus spaces for print form(This field was created for NPL MA).
CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES(Environmental_Controls_being_used__c, 'Spill Kits available'), 'Spill Kits available' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Environmental_Controls_being_used__c, 'Dewatering performed'), 'Dewatering performed' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Environmental_Controls_being_used__c, 'Silt fence'), 'Silt fence' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Environmental_Controls_being_used__c, 'Straw wattles'), 'Straw wattles' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Environmental_Controls_being_used__c, 'Compost filter sock'), 'Compost filter sock' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Environmental_Controls_being_used__c, 'Storm drain protection'), 'Storm drain protection' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Environmental_Controls_being_used__c, 'Dust control'), 'Dust control' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Environmental_Controls_being_used__c, 'Other'), 'Other', null)
CustomField.label: Environmental Controls being used long
